terms.title: Terms and Conditions
list: Experience is not required. Lack of experience is encouraged;
I will help you with posing, styling and feeling comfortable;
The location depends on the shooting concept. Shooting can take place on the street or in a photo studio (studio is paid separately);
All photos will be in color and black and white processing. Examples and stylistics of works can be found on the website;
I choose the photos for processing on my own. Source photos are not transferred to the customer;
Date and time reservation is made after prepayment. Prepayment is 5,000 rubles;
It is possible to change date or time one time in no later than 4 days;
Deadline for photo processing is 2 weeks;
